full_summary:
==========

### Invitation to Tender (IT)

#### Project Title
Public Works Service Policy - Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) Maintenance Services

#### Acknowledgement of Tender Opportunity
A tender opportunity has been announced by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) to provide HVAC maintenance services for buildings located in the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contract Details

*   Tender Reference: PW-__FK-317-81447
*   SOLICITATION NUMBER: EJ196-230212/A
*   Closing Date: December 20, 2022, at 14:00 HAE
*   Expected Contract Duration: Five (5) years
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Essential Requirements and Site Visit

The contractor must provide all necessary tools, services, and labor to execute the work required for the maintenance of the equipment contained herein. 

There are security requirements associated with this requirement. For additional information, please refer to Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.

Mandatory site visits will be conducted for all interested suppliers on Thursday, November 24, 2022, at 269 Laurier Ave in Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Requirements and Terms

*   Manufacturer must provide all necessary tools, services and labor to execute the work required for the maintenance of the equipment contained herein.
*   Manufacturer must execute such work in a careful and workmanlike manner and in accordance with all related Codes, Standards and Regulations from all levels of Government (Provincial/Territorial, Municipal and Federal).
*   Manufacturer must conform to all applicable environmental laws and regulations in effect.
*   The following security level is required for personnel and organization security screening for this contract: SECRET.

#### Eligibility Criteria

Eligibility criteria will be provided with the solicitation document.

#### Documentation

Documentation for this solicitation may be obtained on the Canada Buys website at [canadabuys.canada.ca/documents](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents).

#### Permit Requirement

None.

### Further Information and Contact Details

For any questions or inquiries, please contact:

*   Martin Gauthier:
    *   Email: [martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: (613) 404-8642
    *
